options.name: Pilot
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination and +1 Piloting. You can operate any standard vehicle proficiently, even without prior experience.

options.name: Evasive Maneuvers
options.description: Gain +1 Piloting. You can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on attacks against a vehicle you're piloting.

options.name: Vehicle Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Engineering. You can quickly analyze and understand the controls and capabilities of any vehicle after a brief examination.

options.name: Precision Control
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination and +1 Piloting. You can perform complex maneuvers with vehicles that would normally be impossible or require a difficult check.

options.name: Action : Stunt Pilot
options.description: Perform an extraordinary maneuver with your vehicle that grants you advantage on your next attack or defense while piloting.

options.name: Reaction : Emergency Maneuver
options.description: When your vehicle would take damage or crash, you can make a Piloting check to reduce the damage by half or avoid the crash entirely.

options.name: Ace Pilot
options.description: Gain +1 Piloting and +1 Coordination. You have advantage on all Piloting checks during combat or hazardous conditions.

options.name: Action : Combat Maneuver
options.description: Use your vehicle to perform a special combat maneuver such as ramming, targeting a weak point, or creating cover for allies.

options.name: Free Action : Quick Analysis
options.description: You can instantly assess the status, capabilities, and weak points of any vehicle you can see as a free action.

options.name: Master Pilot
options.description: Gain +1 Piloting and +1 Coordination. You can pilot any vehicle at its maximum capability regardless of damage or environmental conditions. Once per day, you can automatically succeed on a Piloting check without rolling.
